name: Have Fun in Swamp - Prototype
description:
Premise: 

You are the first person who discovers this beautiful swamp. Slime, colorful snails, goldfish, and other lovely animals, as well as fruit and vegetables with magical effects, make it a habitable home. Please enjoy exploring this beautiful swamp and try to interact with everything around you ;) 

Control Tips:  

You can move the Avatar by right-clicking on the ground

 picking up items: G key

eat food: E key 

dropdown items: D key

 use items: Space key

wear items:  W key

craft next to crafting table:  C key

switch item in inventory:  up and down arrows key

Camera Control: 

Hold the right mouse to turn the camera. Hold the middle mouse while move left and right to move the camera left and right. Hold the middle mouse while move up and down to move the camera up and down. scroll the middle mouse wheel to move closer or further.

2-3 Things that  You Can Do:

you can eat magical berries and mushrooms, try their special effects. Pick up a red scarf and straw hat and wear them. Use a seed bag to plant mushrooms and use the scythe to harvest them.

ALSO, you can use a crafting table, one berry, and one mushroom to craft a dish
